ticket.title: better route managment
ticket.original-body:
1. Priorities Rails should have a way to order routes. One idea is to allow specifying priorities, ex. resources :teams, :priority => 100.
2. Remove routes Rails should also have a way to undefine a already defined route.
These features would especially be helpful when using engines.
If you think these could make it into master, I could also stark working on them of course :)
